action_description: This Action will set brightness of your Thinka devices that support brightness.
This Action will set thermostat mode of your Thinka devices that support thermostat mode.
This action will activate a specific scene in your home.
This Action will turn on or off your Thinka devices that support switching on/off.
This Action will set color of your Thinka devices that support color.
This Action will set temperature of your Thinka devices that support temperature.
